comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Charles Seymour Whitman (September 29, 1868 – March 29, 1947) served as the 41st Governor of New York from January 1915 to December 1918." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_S._Whitman The photo was most likely taken on the occasion of the handover of a flying boat to the NY Naval Militia. See comment under

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks B-59 for linking this image to the related ones about the NY Naval Militia ceremony.  We will add more details when we update the description.
